content:
Subscribing to a resource

    SUBSCRIBE http://server/resource HTTP/1.1
    Man: http://www.iana.org/http/gena
    Subscription-Type: update
    Call-Back: http://mypc:8000/listener mailto: joshco@microsoft.com
    Delivery-Control: poll-interval=60
    HTTP/1.1 200 Ok
    Extended-Response: 20041 ; comment=“Subscribed”
    Subscription-ID: ABADCAFE
    Call-Back: http://mypc:8000/listener mailto: joshco@microsoft.com

Previous slide Next slide Back to first slide View graphic version
